page.title: 08Communications
page.content: At Howt Green British Telecom have sited their engineering base for the Sittingbourne area. Little yellow vans can be seen buzzing to and from the site rushing to mend telephones and cables and they all seem to start the day at the Iwade Diner for breakfast and to finish the day there for tea! A survey has shown that over 85% of dwellings now have telephones. The Post Office delivers letters throughout the region twice a day and collects letters from posting boxes at least twice a day. Post Offices are sited at Iwade in the village shop, at Grovehurst in the newspaper shop and at a small stores in Quinton. Most people are within fie minutes walk of a letter box.
